item.description:
This event has been *CANCELED!*
Raw Dessert Demo by Chef Chaya (www.thelivingvision.com). In this hour and a half raw dessert demo Chef Chaya will teach you how to create a divine dessert perfect for any occasion that the whole family will love! You will learn, taste and receive a detailed recipe packet for: Café Gratitude's world famous Key Lime Pie which includes: Creating a Beautiful and Delicious Pie Crust, Creamy Key Lime Pie Filling, Intro into using Irish moss, Multi Use Whipped Cream Topping. Chaya-Ryvka is a raw food chef, raw food pastry chef and health food educator, currently located in Northern California. She has worked as a pastry chef for the voted #1 raw food restaurant Café Gratitude for over three years and has most recently been serving as their Bakery Supervisor and dessert class instructor. Through food preparation workshops, lectures, private classes, and catering Chaya-Ryvka shares with her clients and audiences a new paradigm of food as ideal body/mind/spirit fuel, and medicine while providing the nurturing flavors and textures we have all come to associate with as satisfying "comfort food".

When: Thurs, March 4 @ 7:10 PM after 6PM potluck
RSVP: nancy.zare@gmail.com 508-872-4770
Cost: $20 (10% of will be donated to Optimum Health Solution. "feeding our children a healthy future".)
Checks made out to Optimum Health Solution and mailed to Nancy Zare, 35 Elizabeth Circle, Framingham, MA 01702

Directions to home of Nancy Zare, 35 Elizabeth Circle, Framingham: Take Route 9 to Route 126 South towards downtown Framingham, Ashland Go about 0.7 miles, Passing through 5 traffic lights including one for the fire station. Elizabeth Circle is 2 streets past the 5th light. (Slades Animal Hospital and Dennison St) If you pass the Dunkin' Donuts, you've gone one street too far.

Posted by www.essenic.org
item.name: Potluck & Chaya's Raw Dessert Demo *CANCELED!*
